author: cnbc.com
title: Fred’s Sets Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2017 Conference Call for Wednesday, April 18, 2018 at 8:00 a.m. ET
text:
MEMPHIS, Tenn., April 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fred's, Inc. (NASDAQ:FRED) will hold a conference call on Wednesday, April 18, 2018 at 8:00 a.m. Eastern time to discuss its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended February 3, 2018. The company will report its financial results in a press release prior to the call.
Fred’s management will host the conference call, followed by a question and answer period.
Date: Wednesday, April 18, 2018
Time: 8:00 a.m. Eastern time
Toll-free dial-in number: 1-877-407-4018
International dial-in number: 1-201-689-8471
Conference ID: 13678332
Please call the conference telephone number 5-10 minutes prior to the start time. An operator will register your name and organization. If you have any difficulty connecting with the conference call, please contact Liolios at (949) 574-3860.
The conference call will be broadcast live and available for replay here and via the investor relations section of the Company’s website at investors.fredsinc.com .
A replay of the conference call will be available after 11:00 a.m. Eastern time on the same day through May 2, 2018.
Toll-free replay number: 1-844-512-2921
International replay number: 1-412-317-6671
Replay ID: 13678332
Company Contact
Joe Anto
Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer
(901) 238-3606
Investor Relations Contact
